title: 7x Emmy Winner, BET Awards Recap, Roe VS Wade Controversy, O Verzuz Mario and more.
itunes:title: 7x Emmy Winner, BET Awards Recap, Roe VS Wade Controversy, O Verzuz Mario and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  You should not be surprised who opened the show.  "If you want to get some, then you got to bring some." - The CLO  Culture's Biggest NIght delivered.  Big Dog takes his 7th one for Outstanding Game Show Host.  Supreme Court overturned Roe VS Wade.  Mario clearly won the battle against Omarion, however, the people had One Wish.  Stop singing Ray J!  Trump was brought back to limelight.  An A-List terminal coming to ATL's International Airport.  This round of Would You Rather turned superficial and involved some booty argh.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about the importance of giving honor to God.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
